original_text: His arrows come from all around me. They go deep into my body and my blood pours out on the ground. But God still does not feel sorry for me. His arrows come from all around me.
korean_text: 그의 화살들이 사방에서 날아와 사정 없이 나를 쏨으로 그는 내 콩팥들을 꿰뚫고 그는 내 쓸개가 땅에 흘러나오게 하시는구나

sentences.original_text: His arrows come from all around me.
They go deep into my body
and my blood pours out on the ground.
But God still does not feel sorry for me.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님은 여전히 나를 불쌍히 여기지 않으신다.

sentences.original_text: His arrows come from all around me.
